channel.title: Comments on: Volumes of Revolution – Using This Stuff.
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/04/08/volumes-of-revolution-using-this-stuff/#comment-185">Kevin Feal-Staub</a>.
Awesome - please do!

item.title: By: Kevin Feal-Staub
item.dc:creator: Kevin Feal-Staub
item.description:
Hi Evan, I found this post while reading the internet this weekend and it just happens that I'm at the end of a unit centered around solids and surfaces of revolution. I adapted your idea to this project I'm assigning today. I'll let you know how it goes!
https://docs.google.com/a/putneyschool.org/document/d/1JCEzX12zB_cTJApwdlM_zwCUcMxtVTmdPRxBcd4lvZo/edit#
item.content:encoded:
Hi Evan, I found this post while reading the internet this weekend and it just happens that I’m at the end of a unit centered around solids and surfaces of revolution. I adapted your idea to this project I’m assigning today. I’ll let you know how it goes!

https://docs.google.com/a/putneyschool.org/document/d/1JCEzX12zB_cTJApwdlM_zwCUcMxtVTmdPRxBcd4lvZo/edit#
